original: Hagberg, Nils Emil, ’läroverksadjunkt, Vänersborg, f. 22/4/86 i Silie-rud, Värmtl. 1., av fabr. Lennart H. o. Anna-Lisa Nilsson. G. 19 m. Daga Gelbord. Barn: Bo f. 20, ex. sjö-kapt., Jan 22, situd. v. graf. in^st. — Stud :ex. i Karl-stad 09, fil. mag. i Upps. 14, provår 18. Lär. v. Karlskoga prakt, lärov. 16, e. lär. i Kanlstad 16-17, vik. adj. i Visby 17, timlär. v. Kungsholmens ensk. realsk. samt Bor-garsk. i Sthlm 18, e. lär. i Visby 19-23, e. o. ämnesilär. i Sundbyberg 23-25, vik. lektor i Västerås 25-26, vik. adj. där 26-27, timlär. v. Västerås tekn. sk. ,slamma tid, e. lär. v. östra real i Gbg 27-32, adj. i tyska o. franska v. Vänersb. h. a. 1. sed. 32. Res. t. Tyski. 12, Frankr. 37.
translated: Hagberg, Nils Emil, high-school teacher, Vänersborg, born on April 22, 1886 in Silie-rud, Värmtl. 1., son of factory worker Lennart H. and Anna-Lisa Nilsson. Married in 1919 to Daga Gelbord. Children: Bo, born in 1920 and a former naval captain, Jan, born in 1922 and studying at a graphic institute. Education: Karlstad teaching certificate in 1909, Bachelor of Arts from Uppsala University in 1914, one year of apprenticeship in 1918. Career: Teacher at Karlskoga practical high school in 1916, substitute teacher in Kanlstad from 1916-17, substitute teacher in Visby in 1917, part-time teacher at Kungsholmens private high school and Borkarsk. in Stockholm in 1918, regular teacher in Visby from 1919-23, subject teacher in Sundbyberg from 1923-25, substitute lecturer in Västerås in 1925-26, substitute teacher there from 1926-27, part-time teacher at Västerås technical school, and at the same time, regular teacher at the eastern high school in Gbg from 1927-32, then German and French teacher at Vänersb. h. a. 1. since 1932. Traveled to Germany in 1912 and France in 1937.

structured.name: Nils Emil Hagberg
